ParameterDefinition.LocalizedDescription: The ID of the APP controller implementation.
Regex validation pattern for the target mount point
Regular expression to validate VM name
Defines whether manual steps are required before activating the deployment for the customer.
URL for retrieving a script that is executed after the VM is created
User identifier for executing the script in the VM
User password for executing the script in the VM
Command that is executed after the first boot
VMware template for cloning the VM
Root folder for target folder selection

Operation.LocalizedDescription: Die virtuelle Maschine wird runtergefahren und wieder hochgefahren
The virtual machine will be shutdown and started again
Die virtuelle Maschine wird hochgefahren
The virtual machine will be started
Die virtuelle Maschine wird runtergefahren
The virtual machine will be shutdown
Erzeugt ein Snapshot
Creates a snapshort of the VM
Stellt ein Snapshot wieder her
Restores a snapshot of the VM
